content.en: Efficient Video Compression: Researchers have been investigating the effectiveness of the matching pursuit algorithm in video compression at very low bit rates. The results show that the matching pursuit system outperforms other algorithms in terms of both visual quality and peak signal-to-noise ratio. By assigning bits progressively to high energy areas in motion residual, matching pursuits can effectively code motion in hybrid video coding at low bit rates. Additionally, improvements in search and position coding techniques, as well as better selection of dictionary functions and factorization, have been found to reduce the computational load of matching pursuits video coding.
content.da: Effektiv videokomprimering: Forskere har undersøgt effektiviteten af matching pursuit-algoritmen i videokompression ved meget lave bitrater. Resultaterne viser, at matching pursuit-systemet overgår andre algoritmer både med hensyn til visuel kvalitet og peak signal-til-støj-forhold. Ved progressivt at tildele bits til højenergiske områder i bevægelsesresidualer kan matching pursuits effektivt kode bevægelse i hybrid videokodning ved lave bitrater. Derudover har forbedringer i søge- og positionskodningsteknikker samt bedre valg af ordbogsfunktioner og faktorisering vist sig at reducere den beregningsmæssige byrde ved matching pursuits videokodning.
